DOC.brief_summary: This study aim fill gap literature , identify relevant clinical measure , provide insight independent modifiable risk factor obesity CP population long-term goal improve screening , management prevention obesity at-risk underserved population .
DOC.criteria: Adolescent adult subject 1689 year diagnosis Cerebral Palsy Concurrent severe neurologic medical diagnosis likely contribute subject 's functional impairment , determine study investigator . For example , associate spinal cord injury . Subjects major limb amputation Pregnant lactating female
